heading: Healthcare & AI
description: From predictive diagnostics to mental health bots and robotic surgeries, AI is transforming healthcare delivery. This track explores affordable and scalable AI solutions for India’s healthcare challenges.

heading: Governance & AI
description: Governance is data. AI enables governments to make faster, transparent, and citizen-friendly decisions.

heading: Innovative Startups in AI
description: India’s startup ecosystem is buzzing with AI-driven innovation. This track brings the best AI startups on stage to pitch, demo, and scale.
startup: HyperVerge, Observe.ai, Mad Street Den, Yellow.ai

heading: Smart Cities & Better Living with AI
description: AI is at the heart of India’s urban transformation — powering traffic systems, energy grids, water utilities, and safe city projects.
